name: General Tso's Chicken
ingredients: 1/2 pound boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into small pieces
instructions: 1. In a bowl, combine soy sauce, rice vinegar, hoisin sauce, cornstarch, sesame oil, garlic, ginger, and red pepper flakes. Mix well.
2. Add chicken pieces to the bowl and toss to coat evenly in the marinade. Let it sit for 10-15 minutes.
3. Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Add marinated chicken and stir-fry until cooked through, about 5-6 minutes.
4. Pour chicken broth into the skillet and cook for another 1-2 minutes, until the sauce thickens.
5. Garnish with sliced green onions and sesame seeds.
6. Serve hot with steamed rice or fried rice.
description: General Tso's Chicken is a popular Chinese dish made with crispy chicken pieces tossed in a flavorful sweet-spicy sauce. It is a delicious combination of tender chicken, bold flavors, and a hint of heat.
